overview.en: Flower of life (FOLI) is a generic health public chain that is based on life data, using 1 main chain and 3 side chains (the permanent storage chain, the temporary storage chain and the computing chain) to solve problems about life data, such as stor- age, analysis, alarm and transaction. The core functions of FOLI include: storage of health data; analysis of illnesses; alarm based on big data and the inquiry, search and transaction of health data.
overview.zh: 生命之花(Flower of Life)是基于生命数据的大健康公链，利用 一主链三侧链(永久存储链、临时存储链、计算链)的四链结构解决生 命数据的存储、分析、预警、交易问题。FOLI 核心功能有健康数据存储、 疾病分析、基于大数据的预警和健康数据的查询、搜索和交易。
